situation: A triangular plate of height h = 0.90 m and base b = 2 m is submerged vertically in a water with its top edge (base) at the liquid surface and parallel to it.

subquestions.question: Evaluate the total force acting on one side of the plate in Newtons.
Obtain the location of the force from the center of gravity of the plate, in mm.
Obtain the location of the force from the liquid surface, in mm.
